scripts.install:all: yarn --cwd host install && yarn --cwd remote-query install && yarn --cwd remote-report install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n host,query,report -c auto "yarn --cwd host dev" "yarn --cwd remote-query dev" "yarn --cwd remote-report dev"
scripts.build: yarn --cwd remote-query build && yarn --cwd remote-report build && yarn --cwd host build
scripts.preview: concurrently -n host,query,report -c auto "yarn --cwd host preview" "yarn --cwd remote-query preview" "yarn --cwd remote-report preview"
